mireka.transmission.LocalMailSystemException

  • Packages that use LocalMailSystemException 
    Package Description
    mireka.pop.store
    Provies a file system based POP3 maildrop implementation.
    mireka.transmission
    Provides the reliable transmission service API and the corresponding TransmitterDestination destination.
    mireka.transmission.queue
    Contains a file system based queue implementation.
    mireka.transmission.queuing
    Provides a reliable, queuing Transmitter implementation.
